text: Mbe kaav khaŋ nzuai, “Ana vharari ana ŋgɨ! Ana vharari ana ŋgɨ! Ana ndi khanarareŋ ga tɨgɨ fugu!” Pairat mbara mben nzarigi, “Nde vuzvugi, gu nden ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pana ndi khanarareŋ ga tɨgɨp fukfugɨrie?” Mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza harigi ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pana the ki fhuvara. Sisar nduara!”
